alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 4:54PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Alachua, northeastern Marion and west central Putnam Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 454 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fort McCoy, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts near 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort McCoy, Citra, Cross Creek, Orange Springs, Hog Valley, Johnson and Lochloosa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Western Putnam
